Element.Name: Specification identification
Element.Description: An identification of the specification containing the total set of rules regarding semantic content, cardinalities and business rules to which the data contained in the instance document conforms.

Element.Name: Business process type identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the business process context in which the transaction appears. It enables the buyer to process the document in an appropriate way.

Element.Name: Shopping cart identifier
Element.Description: An identifier for the shopping cart.

Element.Name: Complete cart indicator
Element.Description: Indicate if only a complete shopping cart can be ordered ("true"). That is, that the information and prices in the shopping cart is only valid if the complete cart is ordered.

Element.Name: Shopping cart issue date
Element.Description: The date when the shopping cart was issued. Format= "YYYY-MM-DD"

Element.Name: Shopping cart issue time
Element.Description: The time of day when shopping cart was issued.Format ="hh:mm:ss"

Element.Name: Period end date
Element.Description: The date is the last day of the period.Date until which information and prices stated in the shopping cart are valid. The date on which the period ends.Format= "YYYY-MM-DD"

Element.Name: Period end time
Element.Description: The end time of the period.Date until which information and prices stated in the shopping cart are valid.Format ="hh:mm:ss"

Element.Name: Contract reference
Element.Description: The identification of a contract.

Element.Name: Contract identifier
Element.Description: A reference that uniquely identifies a contract that relates to this transaction.

Element.Name: Seller electronic address
Element.Description: Identifies the seller's electronic address to which a business document may be delivered.

Element.Name: Seller identifier
Element.Description: An identification of the seller.

Element.Name: Seller name
Element.Description: The full (formal) name by which the seller is registered in the national registry of legal entities or persons.

Element.Name: Buyer electronic address
Element.Description: Identifies the buyers electronic address to which the business document should be delivered.

Element.Name: Buyer identifier
Element.Description: A identifier for the buyer that is issued by the party that sends the document in which the identifier is used.An identifier for the buyer.

Element.Name: Buyer name
Element.Description: The full name of the buyer.

Element.Name: Buyer reference identifier
Element.Description: An identifier assigned by the Buyer used for internal routing purposes. This reference should be placed in the order which may follow after the PunchOut transaction is received by the Buyer(contact ID, department, office id, project code)

Element.Name: Shopping cart line identifier
Element.Description: An identifier for an individual line that is unique within a shopping cart.

Element.Name: Contracted item indicator
Element.Description: Reference to the contract when the item is offered in accordance to an existing contract

Element.Name: Availability date information
Element.Description: A shopping cart line may state the item availability date, which is first day before the end of which the particular item can and will be shipped from the seller. If availability date is before the cart issue date then the item is immediately available. The availability of all items in the cart ends when the validity period of the cart ends.

Element.Name: Item availability date
Element.Description: The date when the item will be available for ordering. Format = "YYYY-MM-DD"

Element.Name: Cart line validity date
Element.Description: Date until which information and prices stated in the shopping cart line are valid.

Element.Name: Cart line validity time
Element.Description: The time of the end date until which information and prices stated in the shopping cart line are valid.

Element.Name: Item location quantity information
Element.Description: Properties of the item in this shopping cart line that are dependent on location and quantity.

Element.Name: Shopping cart line delivery lead days
Element.Description: This is the maximum number of working days that may pass from the day the seller receives an order until the day the item is shipped from the seller. The seller may ship earlier. A lead day of one (1) means that an item will be shipped no later than the end of next working day according to the sellers regional calendar.

Attribute.Name: Lead time unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the lead time

Element.Name: Applicable territory address
Element.Description: An address of the territory where the price is applicable.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country.The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Item price
Element.Description: The net price has to be equal with the gross price less the item price discount. The price of an item, exclusive of TAX, after subtracting item price discount.

Element.Name: Item price base quantity
Element.Description: The number of item units to which the price applies. UOM should be stated by using UN/ECE Recommandation 20, including Rec 21 codes - prefixed with X

Attribute.Name: Base quantity unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the base quantity.

Element.Name: Price type
Element.Description: The type of the item price. The type may be given by using codes from UN/CEFACT code list 5387.

Element.Name: Shopping cart line quantity
Element.Description: The number of item units requested by the buyer. UOM should be stated by using UN/ECE Recommandation 20, including Rec 21 codes - prefixed with X

Attribute.Name: Batch quantity unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the batch quantity.

Element.Name: Item description
Element.Description: Free-form field that can be used to give a text description of the item. A detailed description of the item.

Element.Name: Item name
Element.Description: A name for an item. A short name given to an item, such as a name from a Catalogue, as distinct from a description.

Element.Name: Buyers item identifier
Element.Description: An identifier, assigned by the buyer, for the item. Associates the item with its identification according to the buyer's system.

Element.Name: Item sellers identifier
Element.Description: An identifier, assigned by the seller, for the item. Associates the item with its identification according to the seller's system.

Element.Name: Manufacturers item identifier
Element.Description: The manufacturer's identifier for the item.

Element.Name: Item standard identifier
Element.Description: An item identifier based on a registered scheme. Associates the item with its identification according to a standard system.

Attribute.Name: Item standard identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Item standard identifier

Element.Name: Attachment/image identifier
Element.Description: An identifier that can be used to reference the attached document, such as an unique identifier.

Element.Name: Attachment/image description code
Element.Description: A functional description of the attachment/image expressed as code

Element.Name: Attachment descriptionAttached image description
Element.Description: A short description of the attached documentA short description of the attached document

Element.Name: Attached document/image
Element.Description: The attached document embeded as binary object, coded as Base64. The binary object has two supplementary components: a Mime Code, which specifies the Mime type of the attachment and a Filename that is provided by (or on behalf of) the sender of the document

Attribute.Name: Attached document Mime code
Attribute.Description: The mime code of the attached document.

Attribute.Name: Attached document Filename
Attribute.Description: The file name of the attached document

Element.Name: External item specifications
Element.Description: URI reference to external item information or specifications. E.g. web address

Element.Name: Item country of origin
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country.The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Item commodity classification
Element.Description: A code for classifying the item by its type or nature. Classification codes are used to allow grouping of similar items for a various purposes e.g. public procurement (CPV), e-Commerce (UNSPSC) etc.

Attribute.Name: Item classification identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Item classification identifier

Attribute.Name: Item classification identifier version identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme version identifier of the Item classification identifier

Attribute.Name: Clear text name equivalent of classification code
Attribute.Description: The textual equivalent of the code value

Element.Name: Contracted item indicator
Element.Description: The code CT indicates that the item is offered in accordance to the referenced contract.

Element.Name: Item TAX category code
Element.Description: The TAX category code for the item.

Element.Name: Item TAX rate
Element.Description: A TAX rate of zero percent is applied for calculation purposes even if the item is outside the scope of TAX. The TAX rate, represented as percentage that applies to the item.
Tax scheme. E.g. “VAT” or “GST”

Element.Name: Additional item property information
Element.Description: Used to for item properties and also configured product identifier and item is service indicator

Element.Name: Item property name
Element.Description: The name of the property.The name must be sufficiently descriptive to define the value. The definition may be supplemented with the property unit of measure when relevant.

Element.Name: Item property code
Element.Description: Code for the item property according to a property code system

Attribute.Name: Name code list id.
Attribute.Description: An identifier for the code list used for the Name code, this is bilaterally agreed.

Element.Name: Item property value
Element.Description: The value of the item property.

Element.Name: Item property unit of measure
Element.Description: The unit of measure in which the property value is stated, if relevant. May not be relevant when properties are descriptive.

Attribute.Name: Item property unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the value quantity.

Element.Name: Property classification
Element.Description: Standardized and predefined classification of items properties.

Element.Name: Manufacturers name
Element.Description: The name of the manufacturer of the item.

Element.Name: Item label information
Element.Description: Information about the items environmental, social, ethical and quality type of labelling.

Element.Name: Item label name
Element.Description: The name of the product label.

Element.Name: Certificate type code
Element.Description: The UBL structure used for item labeling requires this elements, use the value NA.

Element.Name: Item label type
Element.Description: The label type such environmental, quality, social etc.

Element.Name: Item label value
Element.Description: The label value that applies to the item.

Element.Name: Issuer name
Element.Description: The UBL structure used for item labeling requires this elements, use the value NA.
